body:
Hi everyone! 

I have a model with glass roof and I want to calculate the energy demands in order to estimate an appropriate u-value for the roof. I prepared the definition for the analysis but there are problems with zones and running the simulation. The analysis must be done for London whether. 

I have attached the model and the gh definition to have a look. 

I would appreciate it if somebody can help me.



Nicky

replies.body: Hi Nicky, Sorry for the late reply. I can't download the .rar file. What is exactly the issue you're facing?
